synopsis.text:
Now finding herself in the throes of a high-stakes, all-girl martial arts tournament, ordinary schoolgirl Aya Iseshima is fighting for more than just her survival. Compelled to participate after an unexpected intervention in a street brawl, Aya's only hope of returning to her normal life lies in winning the fabled Platonic Heart, a legendary gem rumored to grant the deepest desire of the victor.

In this clandestine competition, Aya must face off against a diverse array of formidable opponents, including enigmatic shrine maidens, captivating air hostesses, and fellow schoolgirls, each with their own motivations and unique fighting styles. With the risk of expulsion to a dark realm looming over the losers, the stakes couldn't be higher.

As Aya delves deeper into the tournament, she becomes entangled in a web of mysteries surrounding the disappearance of her friend Miko, a fellow competitor. Determined to uncover the truth and secure her wish, Aya must harness her inner strength and prove herself a worthy contender in this relentless battle of wills and fists. Will she emerge victorious, or will she join the ranks of the defeated, never to be heard from again?
